author: mrmitch
title: Tigger and Pooh in one set - Oh my .
review: Great set to start collecting the Winnie the Pooh series. You get alot of blocks for a Duplo set and two of the most beloved characters. My little boy loved the big barrel that Pooh sits in, and with the other Pooh sets we could act out some interesting little stories. A great set for younger kids whose parents are into Pooh.
